title: New Justice Department Media Rules Won’t Help if Trump Wins Again
description:
Merrick Garland’s latest policy includes plenty of vague language that could still make it relatively easy for prosecutors to go after reporters’ sources.

The post New Justice Department Media Rules Won’t Help if Trump Wins Again appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Fight to Stop Republicans From Killing Wolves and Grizzlies
description:
Two new lawsuits want to hold federal and state leaders accountable for failing to protect the iconic predators.

The post The Fight to Stop Republicans From Killing Wolves and Grizzlies appeared first on The Intercept.
